description: Test `format=category` sort output using a template and DEFAULTSORT (#1459, en)

setup.contents: <includeonly>{{#subobject:|Has surname={{{Has surname}}}|Has given name={{{Has given name}}}|Has initials={{{Has initials}}}|@category={{{Category}}}|@sortkey={{{Has surname}}},{{{Has initials}}} }}</includeonly>

{{#subobject:|Has surname=Abbot|Has given name=John|Has initials=J.|@category=SOBJ1459}}{{#subobject: |Has surname=Arthur|Has given name=Frank Walter|Has initials=F.W.|@category=SOBJ1459}}{{#subobject: |Has surname=Baker|Has given name=George Henry|Has initials=G.H.|@category=SOBJ1459}}
{{#ask: [[Category:SOBJ1459]] |?Has surname# |?Has given name# |?Has initials# |format=category |mainlabel=- |template=CategoryListTemplate |sort=Has surname,Has initials }}
